channel.title: Portforward
channel.description: I went to porforward.com and went to my router (Edimax AR7064MG+) and followed the instructions to portforward my router, but it doesnt work at all! After I've finished the tutorial I used their PortChecker and it says that my port isnt open. Can someone help me with it, I have teamvieuwe if you need that.

item.title: Portforward
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

No portforwarding questions.

Look at your connection settings on your computer (Start --> Control Panel --> Network Connections --> Click on connection --> Support -->) to find the last digits of your ip address, E.G.:

192.168.2.###

Then in the box in your router you have to fill in the slot for ###, set mapping ports to 43594, and enable.

Read full topic
